name: Vital Therapy Cleansers, 4 oz.
description:
Please choose the cleanser that best suits your skins needs:


*Apple Delight Cleanser, 4 oz. 

Heaven for dry skin! This is a moisture-rich cleanser that removes impurities and debris without stripping the skin of the natural skin oils. This will not dry out the skin. For all skin types. Contains no SLS or harsh detergents. 




 *Clarifying Cleanser, 4 oz. 
 
This is a gentle yet effective, non–abrasive, alpha hydroxyl, exfoliating cleanser that effectively reduces blemishes. The new technology using AHA polymers results in less skin irritation. The addition of beta-hydroxy acid polymer helps clear the skin of blemishes.



*Extra Gentle Cleanser, 4 oz. 
 
This mild, gentle effective cleanser is ideal for sensitive skin, even rosacea and post-laser resurfacing; soothes and protects while leaving your skin feeling fresh without irritation or dryness.


Please select the Cleanser that is right for your skin type below:

name: Vital Therapy Toners, 4oz
description:
*Antioxidant Toner, 4 oz. 
 
For all skin types. Flushes dirt from pores and repairs free radical damage.

*Clarifying Toner Mild, 4 oz. 
 
This toner is not as strong as the Acne Clarifying Toner, and can be used for normal skin or aging skin. This mild formula is not normally used for acne.

*Strawberry Melon Toner, 4 oz. 
 
Recommended for dry skin – soothes, balances, and hydrates to give your skin a fresher appearance.

*Acne Clarifying Toner, 4 oz. 
 
The AHA’s in this toner decongest pores, help prevent blemishes, and purify and control oil. Phenyl butyl nitrone and beta-carotene provide antioxidant protection.


Please select the Toner that is right for your skin type below:

name: Vital Therapy Treatment Lotions, 2 oz
description:
Lotions can be mixed together with petides/serums or used seperatly.



*Antioxidant Moisturizer For Dry/Damaged Skin, 2 oz. 
 
This is a superior antioxidant face treatment cream. It will moisturize dry, flaky, or damaged skin. This moisturizer is best for sensitive skin and can be used on rosacea, or post laser chemical treatment.


*Ultra Rich AHA Moisturizer, 2 oz. 
 
Vital Therapy Ultra Rich AHA Moisturizer is the ultimate anti-aging moisturizer to give your skin a fresh and healthy glow. Contains advanced ingredients for maximum results in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Use in conjunction with Hydrating Rain for extreme hydration.

Please make the selection of lotion that is right for your skin type below:

options.name: Antioxidant Moisturizer For Dry/Damaged Skin, 2 oz

name: Vital Therapy Peptide Lotions, 2 oz (eye cream 1 oz)
description:
*Hydrating Rain, 2 oz. 
 
This is a nourishing treatment product. It is so moisturizing to the skin it will only be needed once or twice a week after the initial treatment period. Hydrating Rain can be added to any other product except the Vitamin C with Caffeine Serum, to increase the hydration of the skin.

*Ultra Firming Peptide Lotion, 2 oz. 
 
This formula has all the ingredients of the Vital Therapy Peptide Lotion with the addition of DMAE and alpha lipoic acid, 3% of each. DMAE gives greater firming (tone) to the skin, and alpha lipoic acid is a more powerful antioxidant milligram-per-milligram than Vitamin C. The fragrance of the Ultra Firm Peptide Lotion is heavier in order to conceal the fishy odor of DMAE. It also contains idebenone and green tea extract.


*Anti-Inflammatory Acne Peptide Lotion, 2 oz. 
 
This is a powerful anti-inflammatory lotion. It will help even cystic acne improve. New bioactive peptides have even improved this product to a greater degree than the older formula. These peptides now have the capability to heal acne scarring with the proper protocol. Inflammation is an important reason that acne does not improve. When we remove inflammation, the immune system of the body can heal the acne pustules.

* Peptide Eye Cream, 1oz

Diminishes fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes.
Usage Instructions:
Using your ring finger, gently apply a small amount to the area around the eyes, and the eyelids.  Do not tug on the delicate eye tissue.
 



Please make your selection of Peptide Lotions below:

name: Vital Therapy -Plastic Surgery in a Bottle (Paraben Free)
description:
Plastic Surgery In A Bottle, 1 oz. 
 
This product was so named because after an application to the skin, one can see a difference in the skin in as little as 30 minutes. This product uses new anti-aging compounds, called glutathione, in a stable form along with hyaluronic acid, carnosine, and many other ingredients found in the Vital Therapy peptide creams. Glutathione increases microcirculation in the tissues quickly, to enhance skin tone and elasticity as well as hydration. Carnosine acts on dark areas of the skin. It is applied at night in place of the peptide lotion, which is still used during the day. Only one application is needed, as the nutrients have a long half-life. This product works even better if used with the Vital Therapy anti-aging protocol.

options.name: Plastic Surgery In A Bottle, 1 oz.
